1.0.name: wordpress/total-social-followers
1.0.description:
It is best practice to display counts of current subscribers to your various social and distribution media, and while all of the popular services offer proprietary counters, having a small army of buttons and counters on your site looks unprofessional, cluttered, and detracts from your design.

This plugin solves that problem by drawing from Feedburner, Twitter, and Facebook to calculate a single total count of all your subscribers across those services. Of course, if you don't use all of them, you can simply call just the subscribers of the service(s) you do use without breaking the result. Whatever the total count, the output is a text format number that you can include anywhere on your site with a shortcode.
